thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Deutsche Investment Banking Co-Head Has Had Talks About Leaving

author: Jenny Strasburg
title: Deutsche Investment Banking Co-Head Has Had Talks About Leaving
text:
Deutsche Bank AG’s global markets chief and co-head of investment banking, Garth Ritchie, has had discussions about potentially leaving the bank as soon as this year, according to people familiar with the matter.
The prospect has led to internal speculation about who will oversee the German lender’s massive but struggling trading unit, which is under review and could end up being scaled back, The Wall Street Journal reported last week.
...
